thread.section_title: Safegenericpharmacy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Safegenericpharmacy | safegenericpharmacy.com
thread.title: Robert Speaks

author: Robert Speaks
title: Robert Speaks
text: Safe Generic Pharmacy is simply the best online pharmacy I have used! The products, service, prices and communication are great. I did have a problem with my first order arriving but it was an issue that happened at the post office and not with the pharmacy. Safe Generic Pharmacy, however, went out of their way to help resolve the issue. I will definitely be using Safe Generic Pharmacy for my future needs.
